Description.Name: Pirate Drive Harness Upgrade
Description.Details: Some crazy pirate astech has rerouted the wiring of a dropship drive engine, overclocking several computer cores to eek out a slight boost in power. It is technically compatible with the Argo's drive to potentially shave a some time of system transits.

AssignedCastDescription: The Argo's drive is an amazing feat of LosTech and coupled with this Pirate Wiring Harness Upgrade Kit, it looks like we can reduce our travel time a bit more.
